Control Name: 2.17.9 There is an automated process to deploy application releases to production.
Control Statement: The time it takes to perform a complete environment deployment should align with recovery targets. Automation and agility also lead to cost savings due to the reduction of manual actions and errors.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.17 What operational excellence allowances for cost have you made?
